languages.text: "Молчите, регент. Ваш Дом повинен в покушении на Вольного Торговца — обвиняемые получают слово только по высочайшему дозволению". {n}Проктор глухо бьет железным кулаком в грудь.{/n} "Да начнется суд".

"Keep your mouth shut, Regent. Your House is guilty of attempting to take the life of a Rogue Trader — the accused will speak only when graciously permitted to do so." {n}The Proctor's hand slams into his chest with a thud.{/n} "Let judgement begin."
languages.original_text: "Молчите, регент. Ваш Дом повинен в покушении на Вольного Торговца — обвиняемые получают слово только по высочайшему дозволению". {n}Проктор глухо бьет железным кулаком в грудь.{/n} "Да начнется суд".

traits.locale_text: "Keep your mouth shut, Regent. Your House is guilty of attempting to take the life of a Rogue Trader — the accused will speak only when graciously permitted to." {n}The Proctor's hand slams into his chest with a thud.{/n} "Let judgement begin."

"Keep your mouth shut, Regent. Your House is guilty of attempting to take the life of a Rogue Trader — the accused will speak only when graciously permitted to." {n}The Proctor's hand slams into his chest with a thud.{/n} "Let judgement begin."

"Keep your mouth shut, Regent. Your House is guilty of attempting to take the life of a Rogue Trader — the accused will speak only when graciously permitted to do so." {n}The Proctor's hand slams into his chest with a thud.{/n} "Let judgement begin."

"Keep your mouth shut, Regent. Your House is guilty of attempting to take the life of a Rogue Trader — the accused will speak only when graciously permitted to do so." {n}The Proctor's hand slams into his chest with a thud.{/n} "Let judgement begin."

"Keep your mouth shut, Regent. Your House is guilty of attempting to take the life of a Rogue Trader — the accused will speak only when graciously permitted to do so." {n}The Proctor's hand slams into his chest with a thud.{/n} "Let judgement begin."

"Keep your mouth shut, Regent. Your House is guilty of attempting to take the life of a Rogue Trader — the accused will speak only when graciously permitted to do so." {n}The Proctor's hand slams into his chest with a thud.{/n} "Let judgement begin."

languages.text: “保持安静，摄政王。你的家族犯下了重罪，企图谋害行商浪人。被告只有在获得特别恩准的情况下才有权发言。”{n}索罗蒙拍着胸口，发出了“砰”的一声。{/n}“审判正式开始。”
languages.original_text: "Keep your mouth shut, Regent. Your House is guilty of attempting to take the life of a Rogue Trader — the accused will speak only when graciously permitted to do so." {n}The Proctor's hand slams into his chest with a thud.{/n} "Let judgement begin."

traits.locale_text: “保持安静，摄政王。你的家族犯下了重罪，企图谋害行商浪人。被告只有在获得特别恩准的情况下才有权发言。”{n}索罗蒙拍着胸口，发出了“砰”的一声。{/n}“审判正式开始。”

languages.text: «Guarde silencio, regente. Su casa es culpable de atentar contra la vida de un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente. El acusado hablará solo cuando se le permita». {n}La mano del Procurador golpea sonoramente su pecho.{/n} «Que comience el juicio».
languages.original_text: "Keep your mouth shut, Regent. Your House is guilty of attempting to take the life of a Rogue Trader — the accused will speak only when graciously permitted to do so." {n}The Proctor's hand slams into his chest with a thud.{/n} "Let judgement begin."

traits.locale_text: «Guarde silencio, regente. Su casa es culpable de atentar contra la vida de un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente. El acusado hablará solo cuando se le permita». {n}La mano del Procurador golpea sonoramente su pecho.{/n} «Que comience el juicio».

languages.text: « Taisez-vous, régent. Votre maison est accusée d'avoir tenté d'éliminer {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}. Il ne sera permis aux suspects de s'exprimer que s'ils y sont gracieusement autorisés. {n}Le proctor vient placer brutalement sa main sur son torse.{/n} Que le procès commence. »
languages.original_text: "Keep your mouth shut, Regent. Your House is guilty of attempting to take the life of a Rogue Trader — the accused will speak only when graciously permitted to do so." {n}The Proctor's hand slams into his chest with a thud.{/n} "Let judgement begin."

traits.locale_text: « Taisez-vous, régent. Votre maison est accusée d'avoir tenté d'éliminer {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}. Il ne sera permis aux suspects de s'exprimer que s'ils y sont gracieusement autorisés. {n}Le proctor vient placer brutalement sa main sur son torse.{/n} Que le procès commence. »

languages.text: 「黙れ、摂政。お前の一族はローグトレーダーの命を奪おうとした罪に問われている。被告人が発言するのは、寛大にも許可が下されたときのみだ」{n}代理人の手が胸元に鈍い音を立てて打ちつけられる。{/n}「裁判を開始する」
languages.original_text: "Keep your mouth shut, Regent. Your House is guilty of attempting to take the life of a Rogue Trader — the accused will speak only when graciously permitted to do so." {n}The Proctor's hand slams into his chest with a thud.{/n} "Let judgement begin."

traits.locale_text: 「黙れ、摂政。お前の一族はローグトレーダーの命を奪おうとした罪に問われている。被告人が発言するのは、寛大にも許可が下されたときのみだ」{n}代理人の手が胸元に鈍い音を立てて打ちつけられる。{/n}「裁判を開始する」

languages.text: "Kapa çeneni Naip. Hanen, bir Hür Tacir'in hayatına kastetmekle suçlanıyor. Sanık ancak kendisine izin verildiğinde konuşacak." {n}Üsteğmen'in eli, bir gümbürtü eşliğinde göğsüne vuruyor.{/n} "Hüküm başlasın."
languages.original_text: "Keep your mouth shut, Regent. Your House is guilty of attempting to take the life of a Rogue Trader — the accused will speak only when graciously permitted to do so." {n}The Proctor's hand slams into his chest with a thud.{/n} "Let judgement begin."

traits.locale_text: "Kapa çeneni Naip. Hanen, bir Hür Tacir'in hayatına kastetmekle suçlanıyor. Sanık ancak kendisine izin verildiğinde konuşacak." {n}Üsteğmen'in eli bir gümbürtüyle göğsüne vuruyor.{/n} "Hüküm başlasın."

languages.text: "Haltet den Mund, Regent. Euer Haus hat sich eines Mordversuchs an {mf|einen Freihändler|einer Freihändlerin} schuldig gemacht – Angeklagte sprechen nur, wenn ihnen großmütig die Erlaubnis dazu erteilt wird." {n}Der Proktor schlägt sich hörbar mit einer Hand gegen die Brust.{/n} "Möge der Richtspruch beginnen."
languages.original_text: "Keep your mouth shut, Regent. Your House is guilty of attempting to take the life of a Rogue Trader — the accused will speak only when graciously permitted to do so." {n}The Proctor's hand slams into his chest with a thud.{/n} "Let judgement begin."

traits.locale_text: "Haltet den Mund, Regent. Euer Haus hat sich eines Mordversuchs an {mf|einen Freihändler|einer Freihändlerin} schuldig gemacht – Angeklagte sprechen nur, wenn ihnen großmütig die Erlaubnis dazu erteilt wird." {n}Der Proktor schlägt sich hörbar mit einer Hand gegen die Brust.{/n} "Möge der Richtspruch beginnen."
